My Creative Process

Always have a plan, but be willing to adapt.

1

Discuss and Define

Every project is different, so gathering information, defining goals, and managing expectations are critical to a successful project.

2

Break it Down

Large projects are just a collection of small tasks. I like to break things down into components and achieve constant measurable progress.

3

Perform

After knowing what needs to be done, it's time to stop talking and start doing! Self-discipline, motivation, and preparation allow me to excel during the performance aspect of a project.

4

Edit

Even the best-laid plan needs adjustments and revisions. I have a healthy attitude towards revisions and editing and know it's all part of the process.
